Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
Lightning Strike.description: emits chain-lightning (4) when you damage a foe

Tempest Strike.name: Tempest Strike
Tempest Strike.description: more damage and knock foes away

Heartbreak Strike.name: Heartbreak Strike
Heartbreak Strike.description: more damage and inflict weak (-30% attack for 4s)

Frost Strike.name: Frost Strike
Frost Strike.description: more damage and chill (4% slow for 8s, stack 10)

Thunder Flourish.name: Thunder Flourish
Thunder Flourish.description: causes a lightning bolt to strike nearby foes

Tempest Flourish.name: Tempest Flourish
Tempest Flourish.description: more damage and knock foes away

Heartbreah Flourish.name: Heartbreah Flourish
Heartbreah Flourish.description: more damage and inflict weak (-30% attack for 4s)

Frost Flourish.name: Frost Flourish
Frost Flourish.description: more damage and chill (4% slow for 8s, stack 10)

Electric Shot.name: Electric Shot
Electric Shot.description: burst of chain-lightning (5) that bounces between foes

Flood Shot.name: Flood Shot
Flood Shot.description: damages foes in an area and knocks them away

Phalanx Shot.name: Phalanx Shot
Phalanx Shot.description: damages foes in an area and deflects

Slicing Shot.name: Slicing Shot
Slicing Shot.description: sends a blade rift (damage every 0.1s for 4s) does not lodge into enemy

True Shot.name: True Shot
True Shot.description: fire an unblockable seeking arrow with 10% crit chance

Crush Shot.name: Crush Shot
Crush Shot.description: wide, short-range blast that inflicts weak

Trippy Shot.name: Trippy Shot
Trippy Shot.description: lobs a projectile that bursts into festive fog does not lodge into enemy

Crystal Beam.name: Crystal Beam
Crystal Beam.description: crystal that fires a beam (damage every 0.2s for 5s) does not lodge into enemy

Flurry Cast.name: Flurry Cast
Flurry Cast.description: your cast is faster and fully automatic

Thunder Dash.name: Thunder Dash
Thunder Dash.description: causes a lightning bolt to strike nearby foes

Tidal Dash.name: Tidal Dash
Tidal Dash.description: damages foes in an area and knocks them away

Blade Dash.name: Blade Dash
Blade Dash.description: create a blade rift at start (damage every 0.1s for 0.7s)

Passion Dash.name: Passion Dash
Passion Dash.description: inflict damage and weak at end of dash

Mistral Dash.name: Mistral Dash
Mistral Dash.description: shoot a gust ahead that inflicts chill

Greatest Reflex.name: Greatest Reflex
Greatest Reflex.description: dash more times in a row

Zeus's Aid.name: Zeus's Aid
Zeus's Aid.description: lightning strikes nearby foes repeatedly for 1.5s (max 9s)

Poseidon's Aid.name: Poseidon's Aid
Poseidon's Aid.description: surge into foes while impervious for 1.2s (max 7.2s)

Athena's Aid.name: Athena's Aid
Athena's Aid.description: makes you invulnerable and deflects all attacks

Ares' Aid.name: Ares' Aid
Ares' Aid.description: turn into an invulnerable rift blade for 2.5s (max 15s)

Artemis's Aid.name: Artemis's Aid
Artemis's Aid.description: fire 1 unblockable seeking arrow (max 10) with +35% crit

Aphrodite's Aid.name: Aphrodite's Aid
Aphrodite's Aid.description: fire a seeking piercing projectile that inflicts charm

Dionysus's Aid.name: Dionysus's Aid
Dionysus's Aid.description: inflict hangover to all foes around you for 1.5s (max 9s)

Demeter's Aid.name: Demeter's Aid
Demeter's Aid.description: create a winter vortex that chills and damages every 0.25s for 5s (max 15s)

Second Wind.name: Second Wind
Second Wind.description: after using call, gain dodge chance and move speed for 6s

Static Discharge.name: Static Discharge
Static Discharge.description: lightning effects also cause jolted (next attack self-inflicts damage)

Razor Shoals.name: Razor Shoals
Razor Shoals.description: knock-away effects also cause rupture (take damage every 0.2s while moving)

Blinding Flash.name: Blinding Flash
Blinding Flash.description: deflect also makes foes exposed for 5s (take more damage from behind)

Dire Misfortune.name: Dire Misfortune
Dire Misfortune.description: NOT a status curse doom effects deal more damage when applied multiple times

Hunter's Mark.name: Hunter's Mark
Hunter's Mark.description: after dealing critical damage, a foe near it is marked (higher chance of crit for 2.5s)

Sweet Surrender.name: Sweet Surrender
Sweet Surrender.description: weak-afflicted foes are more susceptible to damage

Numbing Sensation.name: Numbing Sensation
Numbing Sensation.description: NOT a status curse hangover effects also makes foes move slower for 4s

Killing Freeze.name: Killing Freeze
Killing Freeze.description: NOT a status curse applying chill to all enemies causes them to slow and decay (every 0.5s)

Hyper Sprint.name: Hyper Sprint
Hyper Sprint.description: after a dash, gain +% move speed and sturdy for a certain amount of time

Storm Lightning.name: Storm Lightning
Storm Lightning.description: chain-lightning effects bounce more times before expiring

Wave Pounding.name: Wave Pounding
Wave Pounding.description: boons with knock-away effects deal bonus damage to bosses

Brilliant Riposte.name: Brilliant Riposte
Brilliant Riposte.description: when you deflect attacks, they deal more damage

Impending Doom.name: Impending Doom
Impending Doom.description: doom effects deal more damage, after +0.5s

Pressure Points.name: Pressure Points
Pressure Points.description: any damage your deal has a chance to be critical

Broken Resolve.name: Broken Resolve
Broken Resolve.description: weak effects are more potent (more damage reduction)

Peer Pressure.name: Peer Pressure
Peer Pressure.description: hangover-afflicted foes contaminate other nearby foes every 4s

Arctic Blast.name: Arctic Blast
Arctic Blast.description: applying 10 stacks of chill causes a blast, clearing the effect

Assault.name: Assault
Assault.description: deal bonus damage striking undamaged foes

High Voltage.name: High Voltage
High Voltage.description: lightning bolt effects deal damage in a larger area

Typhoon's Fury.name: Typhoon's Fury
Typhoon's Fury.description: deal more damage when slamming foes into barriers

Black Metal.name: Black Metal
Black Metal.description: blade rift deals damage in a wider area

Clean Kill.name: Clean Kill
Clean Kill.description: critical effects deal even more damage

Bad Influence.name: Bad Influence
Bad Influence.description: deal more damage while 3 foes are hangover-afflicted

Glacial Glare (C).name: Glacial Glare (C)
Glacial Glare (C).description: your cast fires for a longer duration and inflicts chill

Rush Delivery.name: Rush Delivery
Rush Delivery.description: deal bonus damage based on any bonus move speed

Ambush.name: Ambush
Ambush.description: deal bonus damage striking foes from behind

Double Strike.name: Double Strike
Double Strike.description: lightning bolt effects have a chance to strike twice

Breaking Wave.name: Breaking Wave
Breaking Wave.description: slamming foes into walls or corners creates a watery blast in the area which stuns

Engulfing Vortex.name: Engulfing Vortex
Engulfing Vortex.description: blade rift lasts longer and pulls foes in

Hide Breaker.name: Hide Breaker
Hide Breaker.description: critical effects deal even more damage to armor

Blown Kiss (C).name: Blown Kiss (C)
Blown Kiss (C).description: your cast shoots farther and is stronger against undamaged foes

High Tolerance (C).name: High Tolerance (C)
High Tolerance (C).description: take less damage while standing in festive fog

Heaven's Vengeance.name: Heaven's Vengeance
Heaven's Vengeance.description: ... your foe is struck by lightning

Wave of Despair.name: Wave of Despair
Wave of Despair.description: ... damage nearby foes and inflict weak

Frozen Touch.name: Frozen Touch
Frozen Touch.description: ... damage and completely chill  your foe

Quick Recovery.name: Quick Recovery
Quick Recovery.description: ... quickly dash to recover some health lost

Ruin.name: Ruin
Ruin.description: traps deal bonus damage to foes

Lightning Reflexes.name: Lightning Reflexes
Lightning Reflexes.description: dash just before being hit to counter-attack with a lightning bolt

Hydraulic Might.name: Hydraulic Might
Hydraulic Might.description: attack and special are stronger in the first 5 seconds of encounters

Urge to Kill.name: Urge to Kill
Urge to Kill.description: attack and cast deal more damage

Support Fire.name: Support Fire
Support Fire.description: after you hit with an attack, cast, or special, fire an unblockable seeking arrow

Different League.name: Different League
Different League.description: resist damage from nearby foes' attacks

Positive Outlook.name: Positive Outlook
Positive Outlook.description: take less damage while at 40% health or below

Favor.name: Favor
Favor.description: boons have more chance of being rare or better

Battle Rage (K).name: Battle Rage (K)
Battle Rage (K).description: after slaying a foe, your next attack or special deals more damage

Dying Lament (K).name: Dying Lament (K)
Dying Lament (K).description: when floes are slain, damage nearby foes and inflict weak

After Party.name: After Party
After Party.description: if your health is low after an encounter, restore to the threshold

Clouded Judgment.name: Clouded Judgment
Clouded Judgment.description: god gauge charges faster when dealing or taking damage

Rip Current (Call).name: Rip Current (Call)
Rip Current (Call).description: makes Poseidon's Aid last longer and pull foes in

Proud Bearing.name: Proud Bearing
Proud Bearing.description: begin each encounter with the god gauge partly full

Blood Frenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
Blood Frenzy.description: after using death defiance, deal more damage in that encounter

Exit Wounds.name: Exit Wounds
Exit Wounds.description: foes take damage when cast gems become dislodged

Snow Burst.name: Snow Burst
Snow Burst.description: whenever you cast, damage nearby foes and inflict chill

Quick Reload.name: Quick Reload
Quick Reload.description: foes drop cast gems stuck in them faster

Billowing Strength.name: Billowing Strength
Billowing Strength.description: after using your call, deal more damage for 15s

Boiling Point.name: Boiling Point
Boiling Point.description: god gauge charges faster when taking damage

Hunter Instinct.name: Hunter Instinct
Hunter Instinct.description: god gauge charges faster when dealing critical damage

Ravenous Will.name: Ravenous Will
Ravenous Will.description: while you have no cast gems, take 10% less damage and deal more

Quick Favor.name: Quick Favor
Quick Favor.description: your god gauge slowly charges up automatically

Ocean's Bounty.name: Ocean's Bounty
Ocean's Bounty.description: any gems, darkness, or coin are worth more

Deathless Stand.name: Deathless Stand
Deathless Stand.description: death defiance makes you impervious longer replenish 1 charge

Life Affirmation.name: Life Affirmation
Life Affirmation.description: any health increase rewards are worth more

Premium Vintage.name: Premium Vintage
Premium Vintage.description: gain health when you pick up nectar receive 1 nectar

Nourished Soul.name: Nourished Soul
Nourished Soul.description: any health effects are more potent restore +30% health

Side Hustle.name: Side Hustle
Side Hustle.description: gain some money each time you enter a chamber

Sunken Treasure.name: Sunken Treasure
Sunken Treasure.description: gain an assortment of gems, 50-100 darkness, 50-70 coin, and 10-30 health (nectar)

Last Stand.name: Last Stand
Last Stand.description: death defiance restores more health than usual replenish 1 charge

Strong Drink.name: Strong Drink
Strong Drink.description: using fountains restores all your health and gives you bonus damage

Rare Crop.name: Rare Crop
Rare Crop.description: your boons become common, then gain rarity every 3 encounters

Splitting Bolt.name: Splitting Bolt
Splitting Bolt.description: all lightning effects create an additional burst (5 bounces, 40 damage)

Second Wave.name: Second Wave
Second Wave.description: knock-away effects shove foes a second time 0.7s after the first

Divine Protection.name: Divine Protection
Divine Protection.description: gain a barrier that negates incoming damage (20s cooldown)

Vicious Cycle.name: Vicious Cycle
Vicious Cycle.description: blade rift effects deal 1 more damage for each consecutive hit

Unhealthy Fixation.name: Unhealthy Fixation
Unhealthy Fixation.description: weak effects also have a 15% chance to charm

Black Out (C).name: Black Out (C)
Black Out (C).description: hangover-afflicted foes take +100% bonus damage in festive fog

Winter Harvest.name: Winter Harvest
Winter Harvest.description: chill-affected foes shatter at 10% health, inflicting 50 damage and chill nearby

Greater Recall.name: Greater Recall
